name: Escape From Russia
description:
Help the madman Alexei Marginalny collect an American passport and purchase a first-class ticket for the Moscow-Lubbock flight to leave the Greatest Country in the world.

The main character in the game is Alexei Marginalny, who finally went crazy and decided to leave the great and prosperous state. The leader of the state personally wants to reason with him, to prevent an irreparable mistake, but Alexey is determined and does not intend to retreat. The game is a 3D action adventure in which you need to explore the vast and beloved Russia, in search of 9 parts of the document in a new life, scattered throughout map, then connect them together with a representative of a competing power and evacuate from the place of operation.
During the adventure, you will be able to visit a huge number of unique places and meet colorful, memorable characters, watch the life boiling in the Russian Federation and enjoy the sounds and music caressing your ears that are familiar to all Russians.

Distinctive features:
  • An elaborate map in which everyone recognizes Russia - Mother
  • A huge number of interesting and memorable NPS, including everyone's favorite quilted jacket
  • The atmosphere of chaos inherent in our beloved country
  • Soundtrack, from the greatest representatives of the country
  • The original soundtrack that will not leave indifferent any patriot
